name: Protego
description:
If for whatever reason the game doesn't play, Try playing it on the Pico-8 site: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=39497

Supports Phones and Controllers!!!!

Your the protector of all color!! But these dark sphere baddies started raining on your parade    D:
Kill them to protect all color, and to rack up some nice points  ;)

Dash into enemies to kill them, Kill multiple in a single dash to get combos, which multiply your point gain!

Get a combo of 10 or more to go into a F R E N Z Y

If yall want, post your highest scores! My best score is 2700

Controls: 

Arrow keys - Move

X = Dash / select

Z = O  (to return to start after dying)
